newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-GULLIT TO CASH IN ON "RUUD" CLOTHING.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-GULLIT TO CASH IN ON "RUUD" CLOTHING.

text.p: Ruud Gullit, one of the most popular and successful players in world soccer over the past decade, is to have a range of casual clothing named after him under a five-year deal with a British sports and leisurewear firm.
The dreadlocked former Dutch international, now player-manager of English premier league side Chelsea, is expected to play a role in styling the clothes which will carry his name.
"He's stylish, a great role model and very eloquent," said a company spokesman on Friday.
